mapper.update:
update PDSCI.EDC_VISIT_ELEMENT
RECORD_FLOW = #{record.recordFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISIT_FLOW = #{record.visitFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_CODE = #{record.moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_CODE = #{record.elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_FLOW = #{record.projFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update PDSCI.EDC_VISIT_ELEMENT set RECORD_FLOW = #{record.recordFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_FLOW = #{record.visitFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_CODE = #{record.moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_CODE = #{record.elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_FLOW = #{record.projFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDINAL = #{record.ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PLACEHOLD_MODULE_CODE = #{record.placeholdModuleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{record.createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PDSCI.EDC_VISIT_ELEMENT
VISIT_FLOW = #{visitFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_CODE = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_CODE = #{elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_FLOW = #{projFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDINAL = #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLACEHOLD_MODULE_CODE = #{placeholdModuleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where RECORD_FLOW = #{recordFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
